subject: Howto set a proper description name for a Request created for a list of classes?
msgSnippet: If I perform the below, it returns null. Request.classes(SOME_VALID_CLASSES).getRunner().getDescription().getDisplayName() How can I achieve to set a proper
messageBody:
If I perform the below, it returns null.

Request.classes(SOME_VALID_CLASSES).getRunner().getDescription().getDisplayName()

How can I achieve to set a proper description name? I want to run some tests via:

JUnitCore junit = new JUnitCore();
junit.addListener(new XMLTestListener(...));
Request request = Request.classes(...);
Result result = junit.run(request);

The attached RunListener (it creates the default JUnit XML output) should get the description name in the overwritten method to use it in its XML output:

public void testRunStarted(Description description) {
description.getDisplayName(); // it should not return null
}
